fields.name: Long Island Iced Tea
fields.recipe:
½ ounce Vodka
½ ounce Rum
½ ounce Gin
½ ounce Tequila
½ ounce Triple Sec
1 ounce sour mix
1 ounce cola

fields.name: Moscow Mule
fields.recipe:
Pour 2 ounces Vodka, ½ ounce Lime Juice, and 4 ounces Ginger Beer into a copper mug.
Add ice and garnish with a lime slice. Serve immediately!

fields.name: Vodka Tonic
fields.recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in 1½ ounces of vodka and stir several times.
Pour 4 ounces of tonic water and fill leaving space from the top.
Add a ½ ounce each of lemon juice and lime juice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.recipe:
Place 1 ounce vodka or orange vodka, 1 ounce cranberry juice, ½ ounce Triple Sec, ½ ounce lemon juice, and ½ ounce simple syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake 15 seconds until cold.
Strain the liquid into a martini glass.

fields.name: White Russian
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces Vodka and 1 ounce Coffee Liqueur to a glass with ice.
Top with 1 ounce of heavy cream.
Stir until cold.

fields.name: Dark ’n Stormy
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces Dark Rum and ½ ounce of lime juice to a tall glass with ice.
Top with about 5 ounces of ginger beer.
Stir.

fields.name: Classic Daiquiri
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces white rum, 1 ounce lime juice, and ½ ounce simple syrup into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake vigorously, then strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Piña Colada
fields.recipe:
Freeze ½ cup of pineapple chunks for at least three hours.
Add frozen pineapple, 1 ounce cream of coconut, 1½ ounces white rum, ½ ounce lime juice, and 1½ cups of ice to a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry on top!

fields.name: Rum Punch
fields.recipe:
Add 1 ounce white rum, 1 ounce dark rum, 2 ounces pineapple juice, 1 ounce orange juice, and ½ lime juice to a highball glass.
Stir.
Fill the glass with ice and top with grenadine.
Garnish with a cherry!

fields.name: Hurricane
fields.recipe:
Remove the seeds and skin from the passion fruit and add to a blender to puree.
Add 2 ounces white rum, 2 ounces dark rum, 1 ounce lime juice, 1 ounce orange juice, ½ ounce passion fruit puree, ½ ounce simple syrup, and 1 tsp grenadine into a shaker with ice.
Shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a Hurricane glass with ice.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange wheel!

fields.name: Margarita
fields.recipe:
Add 1½ ounces tequila, 1 ounce triple sec, ½ simple syrup, and ¾ ounce lime juice to a cocktail shaker with ice.
Cover and shake vigorously.
Pour into a glass with ice and serve immediately.
Garnish with a lime slice if desired!

fields.name: Tequila Sunrise
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces blanco tequila and 4 ounces orange juice to a highball glass with ice.
Stir then top with ½ ounce grenadine which will sink to the bottom and create a layered effect.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately!

fields.name: Paloma
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces tequila, 2 ounces grapefruit juice, 2 ounces, 2 ounces club soda, ½ ounce lime juice, and ½ ounce simple syrup into a glass.
Fill the remainder of the glass with ice and adjust sweetness to liking.
Garnish with grapefruit wedge!

fields.name: Gin & Tonic
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces gin and 4 to 6 ounces of tonic water to a highball glass with ice.
Stir gently so to not lose carbonation.
Garnish with lime wedges and serve immediately!

fields.name: Tom Collins
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces gin, 1 ounce lemon juice, ½ ounce simple syrup to a glass.
Fill with ice, top with club soda, and stir.
Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry!

fields.name: Cucumber Cooler
fields.recipe:
Muddle 6 mint leaves and 4-6 cucumber slices in ½ ounce of lime juice and 1 ounce simple syrup until cucumbers are broken up.
Add ice and gin. Shake.
Double strain into a glass with ice and top with 4 ounces of tonic water.
Stir and enjoy!

fields.name: Strawberry Gin Smash
fields.recipe:
Muddle 2 sliced up strawberries, 1 ounce simple syrup, and ½ ounce lime juice.
Strain and add to a glass with ice and add 3 ounces of gin.
Top with club soda and garnish with mint and some strawberry slices!

fields.name: Sidecar
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces brandy, bourbon, OR cognac, 1 ounce triple sec, and ¾ ounce of lemon juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist and enjoy!

fields.name: Brandy Alexander
fields.recipe:
Add 1½ ounces cognac, 1 ounce dark chocolate liqueur, and 1 ounce heavy cream into a shaker with ice.
Shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with ground nutmeg.
Serve immediately!

fields.name: Brandy Cobbler
fields.recipe:
Add 3 ounces of brandy and 1 ounce simple syrup to a glass with crushed ice.
Stir well and top with 2 ounces of club soda if desired.
Add orange slice, lemon slice, and other desired fruits for garnish.
Enjoy!

fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.recipe:
Add 3-4 dashes of bitters (Angostura or Orange), 1 teaspoon of sugar, and a few drops of water to an old fashioned glass and stir.
Add 2 ounces bourbon, ice, and stir.
Garnish with an orange peel and enjoy!

fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces bourbon, 1 ounce lemon juice, ¾ simple syrup, and 1 egg white into a cocktail shaker.
Dry shake for 10-15 seconds.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cocktail cherry!

fields.name: Manhattan
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces rye whiskey, ½ ounce sweet vermouth, and 1-2 dashes Angostura bitters to a shaker.
Stir with ice.
Strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

fields.name: Maiden's Blush
fields.recipe:
Add 1⅔ ounce gin, ⅙ ounce absinthe blanche, ½ ounce lemon juice, ¼ ounce raspberry syrup, and ½ ounce chilled water to a cocktail shaker.
Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist if desired!

fields.name: Absinthe Spider Highball
fields.recipe:
Add a ½ ounce of absinthe verte, 2 dashes of angostura bitters, and 4 ounces of ginger ale into a glass with ice.
Stir and serve!

fields.name: Cucumber & Mint Seltz
fields.recipe: Pour 1⅔ ounce cucumber & mint botanical spirit and 5 ounces club soda to an ice-filled glass and stir.

fields.name: Peach & Orange Blossom Seltz
fields.recipe: Pour 1⅔ ounce peach & orange blossom botanical spirit and 5 ounces club soda into an ice-filled glass and stir.

fields.name: Marginy
fields.recipe:
Add ¾ ounce cognac, ¾ apple brandy, ½ ounce chartreuse, ¾ ounce lemon juice, and ⅓ simple syrup into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon slice if desired.

fields.name: Peach Violet Gin Sour
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces butterfly pea flower gin, 1 ounce lemon juice, ½ ounce peach syrup, ¼ ounce creme de violette, ¼ ounce simple syrup and 3 mint leaves into a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake until chilled then strain into a glass.
Garnish with an edible flower if desired and enjoy!

fields.name: Fig Moscow Mule
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces fig vodka, ½ ounce simple syrup, ½ lime juice, and 6 ounces of ginger beer to a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a moscow mule mug with ice.
Enjoy!
